EmailTemplate.subject: Discover how financial service providers successfully implement unification clouds
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Use case reveals SUCCESSFUL implementations in financial services Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Move to implementation of your unification cloud with more knowledge based on what others have learned along the way.
Read our use case “Unification cloud for financial services <[[https://pages.nokia.com/T001XT_Unification.Cloud.Financial.LP.html?did=d000000000am&utm_campaign=gamechanger&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email&utm_content=email 9b-unificationcloudforfinancialservicesusecase&utm_term=finance]]>” and discover all the drawbacks you should avoid during the new architecture development process. It summarizes the solution functionality across multiple successful Nokia implementations and reveals how you can:
- Unify and simplify even a large enterprise environment arising from mergers and acquisitions into a coherent cloud - Get mission-critical network control and security - Reduce total cost of ownership (TCO) by at least 25 percent!
I hope that you enjoy this use case! Michael Williams
